text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's start Shion's shoot!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (I'll fulfill… my role as principal…!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Shion.)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
—— A person who strives to be good at ballet and yet 
has never fallen is practically unheard of.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Acquiring a skill one does not possess. 
It's daunting, but we still yearn for it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Failing countless times, and retrying each time. 
That's how everyone overcomes the many trials they face.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Retrying to the point of exhaustion, believing that at the 
other end lies the principal role that they yearn for.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: —— Just like you, that time.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Losing multiple times… and feeling frustration. 
Even so, continuing on… aiming to someday 
be the principal of the big stage.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…If you fall, just get up again. It was you 
who showed me, Cheval. That it's possible 
to become the principal that way…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
N-No way…! I… 
There's no way I'm as… strong as you say…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(I just had no choice but to stand back up. To lose heart, 
stand up, and run again. Until I grasped what I aspired to. 
There was nothing else I could do.)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Cheval Grand is coming! Will we see the lead swap!? Cheval Grand! Cheval Grand takes the lead……!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……Haa…… Haah…… Haa……! I…… did it……!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
But… right. I could only do it… because there was 
nothing else I could do… Because I can always only 
do things the clumsy way.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(If I fall, I will just get back up again. If I dream of it… 
I'll go for it. Because for me… constantly unsure as 
I am… there is no other way…!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Vivlos! Um… I have… I have a request.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
The modelling job… I want to do it well… to the end. 
But, honestly, I don't know much about modelling.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
I… I'm sure, among everyone here, the one most 
knowledgeable on this kind of thing… is you.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Please help me…! 
I'll do anything…!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……Hehe♪ Pumped up Chevacchi has shown up! Of course I'll help. Leave it to me☆

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Vivlos…… thank you…… 
……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Er… Erm, this is…

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. A hungry Chevacchi too. Go eat something first. We'll think about your special comeback training when you return!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Ok, I will be back soon. 
…This is also so I can pull out my best later.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Okaay♪ …Good that I spotted Shion at the pool☆ 
Chevacchi seems to respect her.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
"She might stumble due to her clumsiness… but 
I'm sure she can overcome it. When she's ready to 
move forward, give her a push in the back" ——

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
—— Fufu, that's our big sister for you. She gets it～ 
But so do I, of course. I know Chevacchi better than 
anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Alright, I'll show everyone a capable Chevacchi! 
As her dedicated producer, I'll give it my aaall☆

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Since she will be the main focus of the changes, 
we should have a discussion with Cheval herself first.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: I agree. I heard her voice earlier, so she should be in her room.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Then, then～ how about this?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Th-This is surely too ma-mature of a look for me……! 
Th-The design is clearly more suited to our sister……!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Cheval, about the photo shoot tomorrow—— Oh, what are you 
three doing? It seems pretty lively in… here…?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
…Cheval, you want to wear such a daring swimsuit? 
I'm a little surprised.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Th-That's not it! Vivlos just recommended it to me on a whim!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I do agree it would look good on you, Cheval. 
Oh? Now that I've taken a good look, isn't this 
the website of the mall here?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Exactly☆ Tomorrow is a pool shoot again, right? 
I was thinking of getting Chevacchi a new swimsuit.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Chevacchi's started getting really motivated. If she wants 
to go big, going for a swimsuit out of her comfort zone will 
pump her up even more, won't it?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
So… a new swimsuit. Good idea, let's do it! 
We were also just thinking of making some 
changes for the photo shoot.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Yea. I… will do it. I will do it right as a photo model. 
E-Even so… I'm not gonna wear a daring swimsuit…!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I look forward to it. 
Now, you should go while the mall is still open.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
—— Crown, you should go and choose with Cheval's group. 
It's part of your responsibility as the planner, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Duramente… Heh, you're right. In that case, 
I'll pick one out for myself while we're at it.
